articles.title: Love Island fans praise Lucinda for getting 'the ick' over Brad's 'love bombing' - The Mirror
articles.description: While Brad McClelland immediately promised her the world, Lucinda wasn't so keen in how he was layering his feelings on thick with her.
articles.content:
Love Islands Lucinda Strafford has only just snogged Brad McClelland but is already getting the ick - with fans thinking the Geordie has been love-bombing her.

articles.title: Alexa Chung says she was 'gagged' by fashion houses at the start of her career - Daily Mail
articles.description: The British designer, 37, told The Sunday Times she was silenced by certain fashion houses at the start of her career, who would 'borrow' her signature style but wanted her look on their 'terms'.
articles.content:
Alexa Chung has claimed she was silenced by certain fashion houses at the start of her career, claiming some days it was 'tricky' getting dressed.
